overview: As they enter their third year of medical school, a group of young students must prepare to decide what they intend to specialize in. Somehow, they must impress the Chief of Surgery while learning how to survive the life-and-death area of medicine and the complexity of their everyday lives.
tagline: During one incredible year, seven friends discover that love is alive and living in the 90's. Some things never change.
title: Vital Signs
